<Link id="l00018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="18"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="19"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">namespace </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm">llvm</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="20"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="21"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// The inliner pass for the new pass manager.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="22"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="23"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// This pass wires together the inlining utilities and the inline cost</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// analysis into a CGSCC pass. It considers every call in every function in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="25"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// the SCC and tries to inline if profitable. It can be tuned with a number of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// parameters to control what cost model is used and what tradeoffs are made</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// when making the decision.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// It should be noted that the legacy inliners do considerably more than this</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// inliner pass does. They provide logic for manually merging allocas, and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// doing considerable DCE including the DCE of dead functions. This pass makes</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="32"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// every attempt to be simpler. DCE of functions requires complex reasoning</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="33"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// about comdat groups, etc. Instead, it is expected that other more focused</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="34"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// passes be composed to achieve the same end result.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="35" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/inlinerpass"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/inlinerpass/#a1c58fdde44c81bcabb4813490ef574b7">InlinerPass</a> : </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">public</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/passinfomixin">PassInfoMixin</a>&lt;InlinerPass&gt; &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="36"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">public</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="37" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/inlinerpass/#a1c58fdde44c81bcabb4813490ef574b7"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/inlinerpass/#a1c58fdde44c81bcabb4813490ef574b7">InlinerPass</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> OnlyMandatory = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="56"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Module pass, wrapping the inliner pass. This works in conjunction with the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="57"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// InlineAdvisorAnalysis to facilitate inlining decisions taking into account</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="58"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// module-wide state, that need to keep track of inter-inliner pass runs, for</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a4ded4558d2b58dcdd7a1736aa69a8bc4">CGSCCPassManager</a> PM;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;;</span></CodeLine>
